page.title: 07LOCAL PERSONALITIES
page.content: The village of{Kingskettle}may be small but there is a great variety of interesting people. Take{Artie and {Cilla Trezise}for example{who sing for {their supper.}Cilla Fisher and Artie Trezise{sing all over the world}to entertain people. They have also {appeared on television and sung on {radio.}Artie and Cilla{produce records from their{own recording studio}in their house, the Old Post House of Kingskettle. The first{Singing Kettle was such{a great success}that they decided to{produce another}called the {Singing Kettle 2. These records are a {collection of childrens rhymes and {playground songs which tell much of {our heritage}and Artie and Cilla think that they should be preserved. Besides {they are such fun - "Nobody likes me, {everybody hates me, I think I'll go {and eat worms".
